metadata.description:
[kvm-83-262.0.1.el5_9.3] - Added kvm-add-oracle-workaround-for-libvirt-bug.patch - Added kvm-Introduce-oel-machine-type.patch
[kvm-83-262.el5_3] - kvm-kernel-kvm-accept-unaligned-MSR_KVM_SYSTEM_TIME-writes.patch [bz#947363] - Resolves: bz#947363 (RHEL.5.8.32 guest hang when installing)
[kvm-83-262.el5_2] - kvm-kernel-KVM-Fix-for-buffer-overflow-in-handling-of-MSR_KVM_S.patch [bz#917018] - kvm-kernel-KVM-Convert-MSR_KVM_SYSTEM_TIME-to-use-kvm_write_gue.patch [bz#917022] - kvm-kernel-KVM-Fix-bounds-checking-in-ioapic-indirect-register-.patch [bz#917028] - kvm-kernel-do-not-GP-on-unaligned-MSR_KVM_SYSTEM_TIME-write.patch [bz#bz917019] - Resolves: bz#917018 (CVE-2013-1796 kernel: kvm: buffer overflow in handling of MSR_KVM_SYSTEM_TIME [rhel-5.9.z]) - Resolves: bz#917022 (CVE-2013-1797 kernel: kvm: after free issue with the handling of MSR_KVM_SYSTEM_TIME [rhel-5.9.z]) - Resolves: bz#917028 (CVE-2013-1798 kernel: kvm: out-of-bounds access in ioapic indirect register reads [rhel-5.9.z])
